name: robridge-ui
description: RobBridge UI - Robot Control and Barcode Management System

scripts.setup: npm install && cd "../Barcode generator&Scanner" && pip install -r requirements.txt && cd "../Robridge web" && echo "âœ… Setup complete! Run 'npm run dev' to start the system."
scripts.build: cross-env PUBLIC_URL=/bvs react-scripts build && node -e "const fs=require('fs'); if(fs.existsSync('public/robridge-logo.png')) { fs.mkdirSync('build/static/media', {recursive: true}); fs.copyFileSync('public/robridge-logo.png', 'build/static/media/robridge-logo.png'); console.log('Logo copied successfully'); } else { console.log('Logo file not found, skipping copy'); }"
scripts.build-standalone: react-scripts build && node -e "const fs=require('fs'); if(fs.existsSync('public/robridge-logo.png')) { fs.mkdirSync('build/static/media', {recursive: true}); fs.copyFileSync('public/robridge-logo.png', 'build/static/media/robridge-logo.png'); console.log('Logo copied successfully'); } else { console.log('Logo file not found, skipping copy'); }"
